  • Source

Subroutine vom_read_input

253 : 
254 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
255 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
256 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
257 : !*-----PARAMETER READING FROM INPUT.PAR---------------------------------
258 : 
259 :       subroutine vom_read_input ()
260 :       use vegmod
261 :       use vegwatmod
262 :       use watmod
263 :       implicit none
264 : 
265 :       INTEGER :: stat
266 : 
267 :       open(kfile_inputpar, status='old',                               &
268 :      &     file=sfile_inputpar(1:len_trim(sfile_inputpar)))
269 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) oa
270 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) alpha
271 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) cpccf
272 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) tcf
273 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) ny_
274 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) nyt
275 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) k25
276 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) kopt
277 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) ha_
278 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) hd
279 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) toptfac
280 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) tstart
281 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) rlratio
282 : 
283 : !*-----Catchment parameters --------------------------------------------
284 : 
285 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) lat
286 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) cz
287 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) zs_
288 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) cgs
289 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) zr_
290 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) go_    
291 : 
292 : !*-----Soil parameters -------------------------------------------------
293 : 
294 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) ksat_
295 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) thetar_
296 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) thetas_
297 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) nvg_
298 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) avg_
299 :       epsln_ = thetas_ - thetar_             ! epsilon, porosity see Reggiani (2000)
300 :       mvg_ = 1.d0 - (1.d0 / nvg_)            ! van Genuchten soil parameter m
301 : 
302 : !*-----Vertical Resolution ---------------------------------------------
303 : 
304 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) delz_
305 : 
306 : !*-----Vegetation Parameters -------------------------------------------
307 : 
308 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) mdf
309 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) mqxf
310 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) rrootm
311 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) rsurfmin
312 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) rsurfinit
313 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) rootrad
314 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) prootmg
315 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) growthmax
316 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) mdstore
317 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) rgdepth
318 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) firstyear
319 :       read(kfile_inputpar,*) lastyear
320 :       close(kfile_inputpar)
321 : 
322 : !     * The file soilprofile.par contain information about thickness and
323 : !       soil properties in each soil layer, with the layer number in the
324 : !       first column.
325 : 
326 :       M___ = 0
327 : 
328 :       open(kfile_soilprofile, status='old', iostat=stat,               &
329 :      &     file=sfile_soilprofile(1:len_trim(sfile_soilprofile)))
330 :       if (stat .eq. 0) then
331 :         read(kfile_soilprofile,*) M___
332 :       endif
333 :       close(kfile_soilprofile)
334 : 
335 : !     * number of soil layers M___ assuming same thickness everywhere
336 :       if (M___ .eq. 0) M___ = ceiling(cz / delz_)
337 :       N__ = ceiling(ny_ * 365.d0)
338 :       Nh_ = N__ * 24
339 : 
340 :       return
341 :       end subroutine vom_read_input
